code: 'use strict';var buffer=require('buffer');var Buffer=buffer.Buffer;var safer={};var key;for(key in buffer){if(!buffer.hasOwnProperty(key))continue;if(key==='SlowBuffer'||key==='Buffer')continue;safer[key]=buffer[key];}var Safer=safer.Buffer={};for(key in Buffer){if(!Buffer.hasOwnProperty(key))continue;if(key==='allocUnsafe'||key==='allocUnsafeSlow')continue;Safer[key]=Buffer[key];}safer.Buffer.prototype=Buffer.prototype;if(!Safer.from||Safer.from===Uint8Array.from){Safer.from=function(value,encodingOrOffset,length){if(typeof value==='number'){throw new TypeError('The "value" argument must not be of type number.
